import React from 'react' import styles from './ButtonCourseItem.module.scss' const ButtonCourseItem = (props) => { const { type, onClick, onClickBuyNow } = props const ButtonTypeCase = () => { switch (type) { case 'addToCart': return
case 'learnNow': return
case 'extend': return
default: return
} } return ( ) } export default ButtonCourseItem
